snippet.title: Arcadegeddon Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Super City, where the last hometown arcade is at risk of extinction.

Grab your gauntlet and flex your style: Arcadegeddon has now fully launched! As Plug, you'll help your Uncle Gilly save his newest game, Arcadegeddon, from a hack by FFC (Fun Fun Co., the evil megacorp of Super City that brings a new level of "hostile" to "hostile takeover").

Defend Arcadegeddon by kicking Fun Fun Co.'s out of six unique biomes in this ever-evolving cooperative shooter. Shoot for the leaderboards solo or, with crossplay party invites, with up to three friends across PlayStation, Xbox, and PC. Challenge an increasingly difficult PVE onslaught of FFC bots and Data Daemons, challenge four different bosses, and save your uncle's arcade. Want to run for the ultimate high score? Keep on playing after completing your Boss Run and go for the global first place.

Abilities? Complete Gang Leader challenges to earn tokens and unlock game-changing offensive and support abilities.
Fun weapons? From your trusty Light Gun to the heavy hitting Gillytine sword, you'll have over 35 different ways to save Gilly's Arcade. And by using your favs to take on FFC, you'll earn the ability to unlock them as starting equipment in your future runs
PVE? PVP? Yes. Play PVE with up to three people, and play optional mid-round PVP matches for additional loot. Or just jump straight into the PVP mode to take on the world. Or play a solo run through Arcadegeddon. It's up to you.
Style? We've got tons and we want you to show yours off too. Unlock cosmetics to customize your character and bring your unique drip to Super City.
Collectables? We got you with 51 different figures to fill out Gilly's Arcade.

It's time to Rise Up And Play.

Available for now on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox X|S, and PC (Epic Games Store). Cross-platform party invites require linking your console version of the game to an Epic Games account.

For more details, visit us at https://www.arcadegeddon.com

For the latest news, follow us at:
https://www.twitter.com/Arcadegeddon
https://www.instagram.com/Arcadegeddon
https://www.facebook.com/Arcadegeddon

And join our official Discord at https://discord.gg/Arcadegeddon
